title: Giraffe Centre
description: Experience the world-famous Maasai Mara with game drives, cultural visits, and luxury camping under the stars.
itinerary: Day 1: 6:00 AM - Depart Nairobi for Maasai Mara
Day 1: 12:00 PM - Arrive and have lunch
Day 1: 3:00 PM - Afternoon game drive
Day 1: 7:00 PM - Dinner and overnight at luxury camp
Day 2: 6:00 AM - Morning game drive
Day 2: 10:00 AM - Visit Maasai village
Day 2: 12:00 PM - Lunch and departure
Day 2: 6:00 PM - Arrive back in Nairobi
